SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Blink
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns for the duration of the spell.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Clairvoyance
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Counterspell
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Daylight
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: A 60-foot-radius sphere of light spreads out from a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Dispel Magic
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: Choose any creature, object, or magical effect within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Fear
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Fireball
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Fly
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Gaseous Form
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Haste
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Lightning Bolt
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Major Image
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Protection from Energy
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Sleet Storm
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Slow
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Stinking Cloud
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Tongues
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Water Breathing
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: This spell gives a maximum of ten willing creatures within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.

SorcererLevel3Spells.Name: Water Walk
SorcererLevel3Spells.Description: This spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface—such as water, acid, mud, snow, quicksand, or lava—as if it were harmless solid ground.
